name: google-ai-mcp
description: Complete MCP server for Google AI services - VEO 3 video generation, Imagen 4 images, Gemini text, and Lyria 2 music through Vertex AI

tools.name: imagen_generate_image
tools.description: Generate photorealistic images using Google Imagen 4

parameters.prompt: Text description of the image to generate
parameters.negativePrompt: What to avoid in the generation

tools.name: veo_generate_video
tools.description: Generate videos using Google VEO 3 (5-8 seconds with audio)

parameters.prompt: Text description of the video to generate
parameters.negativePrompt: What to avoid in the generation

tools.name: gemini_generate_text
tools.description: Generate text using Google Gemini models

parameters.model: Gemini model to use (gemini-1.5-pro, gemini-1.5-flash, gemini-2.0-flash-exp)

tools.name: lyria_generate_music
tools.description: Generate music using Google Lyria 2 (currently in mock mode)

parameters.textPrompt: Text description of the music to generate
parameters.tempo: Tempo of the music (slow, medium, fast)

tools.name: check_operation_status
tools.description: Check the status of a long-running operation

parameters.operationName: Operation name from a previous request

examples.title: Generate an Image
examples.code: await imagen_generate_image({ prompt: 'A serene mountain landscape at sunset', aspectRatio: '16:9' })

examples.title: Generate a Video
examples.description: Create a short video with VEO 3
examples.code: await veo_generate_video({ prompt: 'A timelapse of clouds moving over a city skyline', duration: 5 })
